name: IconUtils Project File
summary: Learn about .ICPR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When editing is complete, you can export IconUtils projects to icon files, cursor files (.CUR, .ANI), icon library files (.ICL), or cursor library files (.CL). They can also be exported to several standard bitmap graphic formats.
NOTE: ICPR files are actually saved by IconLover, a program included with the IconUtils software package. Other Aha-Soft applications can also save ICPR files, including ArtIcons Pro.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
